decks.notes: This Legacy combo deck aims to quickly mill the entire library by playing a series of low-cost spells and sacrificing creatures to then win the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck includes multiple fast mana sources to accelerate the combo, along with protection spells like Pact of Negation. The goal is to efficiently execute the combo as quickly as possible, bypassing the opponent's defenses and overwhelming them with a game-ending play. The synergy between the cards in the deck enables a high-speed win condition that can catch opponents off guard.

The main focus of this Dragon Stompy deck is disrupting opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon, while also generating fast mana through cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide. The deck aims to quickly lock down the opponent's resources and overwhelm them with aggressive creatures and powerful spells like Sundering Eruption and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. The combination of disruptive elements and fast win conditions make this deck a formidable threat in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively utilize artifacts, primarily blue artifacts, to overwhelm the opponent and control the game. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble provide card advantage and Mox Opal helps to ramp into other powerful artifacts. By efficiently utilizing cards like Urza's Saga and Pithing Needle, the deck can disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a strong board presence. The inclusion of cards like Force of Will and Ancient Tomb ensures that the deck has both protection and the ability to quickly deploy threats.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining control and tempo through efficient spells and creatures. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's hand and spells while deploying threats like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower to pressure the opponent. The deck also makes use of efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out to deal with opposing creatures. Overall, the strategy revolves around controlling the game through disruption and tempo plays to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while drawing cards and stabilizing the board with powerful threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. It also utilizes various land cards to fix mana and maintain consistency in its mana base. Overall, this deck relies on efficiently controlling the game and out-valuing the opponent to secure victory.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach, while also utilizing counterspells like Force of Will to maintain control. It also features efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out to deal with threats. The creatures in the deck, such as Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Murktide Regent, provide aggressive pressure and tempo advantage. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student allows for card advantage and selection. Wasteland is used to disrupt the opponent's mana base. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on using a combination of disruptive spells and efficient creatures to quickly control the pace of the game. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, Fatal Push, and Force of Will, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while developing its own board presence. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares adds a card advantage and pressure aspect to the deck, allowing it to maintain control while applying pressure to the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to win through a combination of disruption and aggression.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Ancient Tomb, and disrupt opponents with cards like Chalice of the Void. The deck focuses on playing powerful threats like Dragon Stompy creatures and using powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Karn, the Great Creator to control the board and overwhelm opponents. The goal is to quickly pressure opponents and use a combination of aggression and disruption to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through hand disruption and removal spells while efficiently deploying threats to pressure the opponent. It aims to control the tempo of the game by using efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower, backed up by disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach. The deck also utilizes counter spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its threats and maintain board presence. Additionally, the deck has access to powerful card draw and selection with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brainstorm.

This deck aims to generate a large amount of mana quickly using cards like Dark Ritual and Lion's Eye Diamond, in order to cast spells that build up a storm count, like Burning Wish and Tendrils of Agony. By chaining spells together and utilizing cards like Echo of Eons and Song of Creation, the deck can generate lethal amounts of damage or card advantage in a single turn. The inclusion of Veil of Summer and Hexing Squelcher helps protect the combo from disruption, allowing the deck to execute its powerful game plan efficiently.

The deck revolves around putting powerful creatures into play for free by utilizing the cards Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. By cheating out massive threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, the deck aims to overwhelm and outpace opponents. The deck also includes protection and card draw spells to ensure consistency and survivability. With the ability to put game-ending threats into play early, the deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can respond effectively.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive plays, utilizing cards like Brainstorm, Lightning Bolt, and Dragon's Rage Channeler to deal damage quickly. The deck focuses on tempo and disruption, using cards like Wasteland and Boomerang Basics to control the board and keep the opponent on the back foot. Murktide Regent and Cori-Steel Cutter provide strong threats that can quickly close out the game. The deck also includes a mix of card draw and protection with cards like Ponder, Force of Will, and Mishra's Bauble.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board by utilizing lands to disrupt the opponent's strategy and slowly build up a powerful win condition. The deck includes key cards like Thespian's Stage and Dark Depths to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token, while also using cards like Wasteland and Ghost Quarter to disrupt the opponent's mana base. Life from the Loam is used to recur lands from the graveyard, providing consistency and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent through resource denial and a powerful late-game win condition.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while maintaining a fast-paced aggressive strategy. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze to counter or discard key cards from your opponent's hand, you can control the board and push your own threats through. Cards like Orcish Bowmasters and Murktide Regent provide strong aggressive threats, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student allows you to draw cards and generate value. Utilizing a mix of efficient removal spells and counter magic, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver your opponent to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Tomb to power out large Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. Cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland help disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Glaring Fleshraker and Wastescape Battlemage provide aggressive threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, powerful creatures and disruption spells, making it a strong choice for players looking to play an aggressive aggro strategy in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to combine aggressive creatures with disruptive elements to control the board and pressure the opponent. With cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Aether Vial, the deck can efficiently deploy threats while utilizing powerful removal spells like Swords to Plowshares. Additionally, the inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and flexibility. By leveraging a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly closing out the game with aggressive threats.
